subject: Weekly Update
body: Here are the latest updates from our company. We are proud to announce our new product line.

subject: Let's catch up soon
body: Hey, it's been a while since we last spoke. How about grabbing lunch next week?

subject: Your account statement
body: Dear customer, your monthly account statement is ready. Please review it in your online banking portal.

subject: Project Status Update
body: The project is on track for completion by the end of the month. Let me know if you need any additional resources.

subject: Your subscription has been renewed
body: Thank you for renewing your subscription. Your account has been updated.

subject: Contribution Welcome
body: We are happy to inform you that your contribution to our open-source project has been accepted.
